data.name: Penetration Testing
content: Experienced in conducting security assessments and intrusion testing.
Proficient in identifying vulnerabilities in web applications and networks.
Hands-on practice with modern penetration testing tools and methodologies.

data.name: Network Security
content: Strong understanding of network protocols and security measures.
Experience monitoring network traffic and identifying security threats.
Knowledge of firewalls, IDS/IPS, and network segmentation.

data.name: Incident Response
content: Trained in responding to security incidents and breaches.
Experience with security monitoring and threat detection.
Familiar with incident response procedures and best practices.

data.name: Security Analysis
content: Skilled in analyzing security vulnerabilities and threats.
Experience with vulnerability assessment tools and techniques.
Ability to provide security recommendations and implement protective measures.

data.name: DevOps & Automation
content: Growing interest in DevOps practices and automation.
Curiosity for cloud security and infrastructure management.
